events.name: GA Presents: Watson 101 and the Launch of the Watson New Venture Challenge
events.description:
Join us for Watson 101 and the launch of the Watson New Venture Challenge in APAC. 

We'll have a comprehensive presentation and sharing session. You'll get to learn more about Watson services, witness what Watson apps can achieve, and a taste of using cognitive technologies. 

This is a free event. Please register here - http://bit.ly/IBMwatsonSG

Agenda
- Registration
- Welcome by General Assembly
- Opening address by IBM
- Introduction of Cognitive Computing & IBM Watson Ecosystem
- Sharing of IBM Watson Case Study and Cognitive Services on the IBM Watson Developer Cloud
- Exclusive preview of how a sample app is built with IBM Watson
- Discovering the future and possibilities of IBM Watson
- Launch of the Watson New Venture Challenge
- Networking and drinks

Takeaways
- Hear about how to work with IBM Watson from experts
- Learn how IBM Watson and cognitive computing are powering applications today
- Witness how a Watson based app is built 
- Network with industry experts

This event is perfect for application developers and technical leaders who want to learn how to use next-gen technology to revolutionize products and applications.
